title: any way to adjust apps that are too small for the pixel 5?
content:
im a proud owner of a new pixel 5!
so far im really enjoying it, having owned a 5 year old asus for so long

one issue im having is apps that dont fit the screen , which isnt THE issue, i get it, app size res might not match up with the pixel's longer screen, but when i turn the phone on its side to play games or use apps that work horizontally only.

the 2 ends of the 'deadzone' are uneven, the side with the front-facing camera is nearly twice the width of the other end, which is probably around just under 1cm where the charging port is.

im wondering if theres a way to shift the app left or right so it sits in the middle relative to the physical phone itself so i dont have to hold it offset center in my tiny hands to use horizontally locked apps.

or vice versa
is there a way i can make horizontally locked apps fill and use my entire pixel 5's screen (or most of it)


thank you all in advance for the help!
